thread.title: Jamie O'Hara explains Bianca split and admits he's trying to win back ex as they enjoy Dubai holiday
thread.title_full: Jamie O'Hara explains Bianca split and admits he's trying to win back ex as they enjoy Dubai holiday

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Jamie O'Hara explains Bianca split and admits he's trying to win back ex as they enjoy Dubai holiday
text:
Jamie O'Hara explains Bianca split and admits he's trying to win back ex as they enjoy Dubai holiday It's a fresh blow for Bianca Gascoigne who was dumped four days after leaving the CBB house Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jamie O'Hara causes a SPLASH in Dubai Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jamie O'Hara has taken to social media to clear up any confusion surrounding his current relationship status and to explain in detail why he ended things with Bianca Gascogine. 
The Celebrity Big Brother star, who dumped Bianca just four days after leaving the house, is reportedly enjoying a romantic holiday in Dubai with Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney. 
As it emerged the pair were on the getaway together and sources claimed they had never actuallt in the first place, Jamie decided to explain why he broke things off with Bianca - and what's going on with Elizabeth-Jayne. 
He wrote on Twitter on Wednesday night: "The reason I left it with Bianca was because after I got out and sat down and looked at the whole situation I realised that it wasn't for me, I have a lot going on in my life and she had a boyfriend and he was devastated about the situation. Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney (Photo: Instagram) 
"I didn't know the full extent of the situation until I got out and saw everything, as a man I didn't think it was the right thing to do, I didn't do anything wrong I didn't make any gain out of it. 
He then admitted he was trying to win his ex back after reconciling with her. 
"As for my ex we split up a while ago, I reached out to her because I realised she's an incredible person and having time apart made me realise what an amazing woman she is and I was lucky to have her in my life. Will she be with me again? I don't know, but as a man all I can do is try." 
While the footballer hasn't been shy about sharing snaps from the romantic getaway, the model is yet to post anything. 
But while Jamie insists he was single before going into the house, a source told the Mail Online that Jamie and Elizabeth had been together the entire time. Read More Jamie O'Hara and Bianca Gascoigne (Photo: Supplied by WENN) Jamie O'Hara and Bianca Gascoigne (Photo: Rex Features) 
They said: “They remained close before his time on CBB despite claiming to have been broken up. 
“It’s quite hypocritical, especially because of his reaction to Bianca revealing she had a boyfriend on the show.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
